xwikidoc.name: phenotipsArchive20140207
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 07 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 10:29 <akats> has joined #phenotips 10:42 <sdumitriu> has quit 13:24 <akats> - In PatientExtendedPhenotypeUpdater there is an initialize method. It's empty now, does it still need to stay? 13:24 <akats> https://github.com/soLEED/phenotips-1/compare/issue-719?expand=1 13:25 <akats> Hm... shift+enter in IRC causes errors 13:25 <sdumitriu1> akats: Don't mind phenotips_org, it's a simple bot 13:26 <akats> oh... so you still get all my messages 13:29 <akats> btw what is hpoa? Helper services? 13:29 <sdumitriu1> Human Phenotype Ontology Access 14:02 <akats> Is the search on line 306 in https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/components/solr-access-service/src/main/java/org/phenotips/solr/AbstractSolrScriptService.java replaceable with the search on line 132 in https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/components/ontology-access/api/src/main/java/org/phenotips/ontology/internal/solr/AbstractSolrOntologyService.java 14:03 <sdumitriu1> Not really 14:04 <sdumitriu1> The params for the deprecated search are equivalent to the second parameters for the new function 14:04 <sdumitriu1> With a single q value replacing the explicit map of terms 14:06 <akats> so then the idea would be to change how the $parameters are created for $services.hpo.customSearch($parameters) 14:06 <akats> https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/resources/ui/src/main/resources/PhenoTips/SolrService.xml 14:06 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:07 <sdumitriu1> That is not a very easy task 14:08 <akats> Then while I'm bothering you anyways the idea for changing $services.hpo.search("$!request.q", "$!request.sort", $rows, $start) would be to put $rows, and $start and etc into the Map<String, String> queryOptions 14:08 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:08 <akats> ok. thanks. 15:01 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 15:19 <sdumitriu> has quit 15:23 <akats> Marta is this Xwiki class used anymore? https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/resources/ui/src/main/resources/PhenoTips/SolrService.xml. I deleted it from a running XWiki instance and the patient record seems to load just fine. However it is referenced in a few places. 15:24 <sdumitriu1> akats: Looking 15:25 <sdumitriu1> Yes, that one is very important 15:25 <sdumitriu1> It's the one that powers the phenotype search 15:27 <akats> The"Quick phenotype search" I'm assuming 15:28 <sdumitriu1> Yes 15:28 <akats> Is there a way to log from velocity scripts? 15:29 <sdumitriu1> Yes, there's a very ugly and complicated way 15:29 <sdumitriu1> What do you need to debug? 16:17 <akats> Well I came to the conclusion that I need your help 16:47 <akats> /resources/ui/*/PatientPhenotypeExportService.xml Is this used anywhere currently? Searching for PatientPhenotypeExportService through the whole project gives no results. 16:47 <sdumitriu1> It is 16:47 <sdumitriu1> Not within PhenoTips, but from other programs 16:48 <sdumitriu1> It's the current basic JSON export implementation... 16:48 <akats> Then a general question: how am I supposed to find that out without asking you? 16:48 <sdumitriu1> Without asking me, ask Marta :D 16:49 <sdumitriu1> Yeah, it should be documented 16:49 <sdumitriu1> Once we have the new JSON working, it will be properly documented 16:51 <akats> Lol. Is there documentation for PhenoTips except JavaDoc? 16:54 <sdumitriu1> Only a few pages on phenotips.org 16:55 <sdumitriu1> But they're mostly about usage and administration, not development 16:56 <sdumitriu1> Yes, the pedigree must be enabled from the administration 17:45 <akats> #3 https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/709 17:57 <sdumitriu1> akats: Try 708 17:57 <sdumitriu1> 709 we're not sure we want to implement 17:57 <sdumitriu1> And 658 may be something that allasm is working on already 17:58 <akats> ok. 708 it is. 18:00 <sdumitriu1> akats: Eclipse has a setting for space after > 18:01 <akats> I see what you're trying to do there. 18:02 <akats> :) 18:36 <akats> has quit 19:09 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 21:47 <sdumitriu> has quit
